data.eml:eml: Alfredo Dugès’ type specimens of amphibians and reptiles revisited

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Flores-Villela, Oscar, Ríos-Muñoz, César A., Magaña-Cota, Gloria E., Quezadas-Tapia, Néstor L. (2016): Alfredo Dugès’ type specimens of amphibians and reptiles revisited. Zootaxa 4092 (1), DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4092.1.2
